params.name: images
params.type: PIL.Image.Image, np.ndarray, torch.Tensor, List[PIL.Image.Image], List[np.ndarray], List[torch.Tensor]
params.description: The image or batch of images to be prepared. Each image can be a PIL image, NumPy array or PyTorchtensor. In case of a NumPy array/PyTorch tensor, each image should be of shape (C, H, W), where C is anumber of channels, H and W are image height and width.

params.name: return_tensors
params.description: If set, will return tensors of a particular framework. Acceptable values are:tf: Return TensorFlow tf.constant objects.pt: Return PyTorch torch.Tensor objects.np: Return NumPy np.ndarray objects.jax: Return JAX jnp.ndarray objects.
